content.question: Which of the following pair of Supreme Court cases best illustrates how views of federalism have shifted in the United States?

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how the facts, issue, holding, reasoning, decision and majority opinion of a required Supreme Court case compare to a non-required Supreme Court case.
